divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my bedroom eating breakfast, it was about 7:40 am. My window blinds were drawn. Suddenly a bright flash lit up my room. I've never seen anything like it before. I thought it might have been a reflection off of a car, but I didn't hear a car. (I hear every car that goes by my house because my bedroom is close to the road.) The flash only lasted about half a second. It was bright like sunlight. My window faces north. The light somehow filled every corner of my room and shone straight in. I have no idea what this could have been.
Summary: I saw a bright flash of light.
